string.name: anti_fraud_text
string.value: Get alerted to possible scams during calls.

string.name: New_CAll_DESC
string.value: Service is provided by your carrier.

string.name: Notify_during_call
string.value: Notify me of incoming calls during a call.

string.name: open_mobile_data_detail
string.value: This feature requires a mobile data connection. Go to Settings to enable mobile data.

string.name: unlock_after_call_notification_description
string.value:
Incoming calls are always shown as banners when you're playing games, navigating on a map, or viewing images and videos in full screen.

They are always shown in full screen when you're using Simple, Senior, or Expedition mode.

string.name: incoming_notification_setting_tips
string.value: You can choose to have incoming call notifications shown in full screen or as banners. Change your preferences at any time in Phone > Settings > Notifications when unlocked.

string.name: mobile_data_enableDataWhileRoaming
string.value: Connect to data services while roaming.

string.name: mobile_data_confirmation_function
string.value: Confirm that this service is available before enabling. Otherwise calling may be affected.

string.name: mobile_data_turn_on_data_roaming
string.value: Data roaming may result in additional data usage fees. Enable anyway?

string.name: Apn_MNC_must_be_2_or_3_digits
string.value: MNC field must be 2 or 3 digits.

string.name: text_paragraphs
string.value: If you disable this, your phone will only register with networks you manually select. This may disable your data service. Your current network may also be temporarily unavailable during manual network selection. Disable anyway?

string.name: text_paragraphs_no_data
string.value: If you disable this, your phone will only register with networks you manually select. This may disable your data service. Disable anyway?

string.name: mobile_fail
string.value: Unable to retrieve carrier list. Try again later.

string.name: number_identity_short_notification
string.value: This service requires an Internet connection and the Contacts permission, and needs to read your contacts, read and modify the call log, and read and upload/transfer SMS message content. By turning this on, you agree to these terms. For more details about how your personal information is processed, refer to the Statement About Call & Message Identification and Privacy and Permissions Notice.

string.name: short_notification_hyperlink
string.value: Statement About Online Number Identification, Harassment Blocking and Privacy

string.name: start_skycom_satellite_communications_sub1
string.value: When you're outside of WLAN and cellular coverage, you can continue using your phone's calling and messaging functions via satellite.

string.name: start_skycom_satellite_communications_sub3
string.value: When you connect to the Tiantong satellite, your precise location will be uploaded to the satellite operator.

string.name: satellite_revoke_authorization_message
string.value: This service will no longer be available if you disable it. Disable anyway?

string.name: enter_in_call
string.value: Unable to enable Tiantong Satellite Communications during a call.

string.name: satellite_service_no_sim_card_descriptions
string.value: Please insert a SIM card with Tiantong Satellite Communications activated and try again.

string.name: satellite_service_settings_enable_tips
string.value: As satellite capacity is limited, please only use this feature when you don't have cellular service. Enabling Tiantong Satellite Communications disables WLAN, mobile data, Location Services, as well as related features.

string.name: satellite_service_details_0
string.value: %1$s. As satellite capacity is limited, you are advised to use your cellular network when you have service. %2$s

string.name: satellite_service_select_sim_card
string.value: Select a SIM for satellite calling and messaging. Confirm with your carrier that this service is activated.

string.name: satellite_service_network_descriptions
string.value: Call and text via the Tiantong satellite system.

string.name: satellite_service_permission_count
string.value: This service requires the following permission:

string.name: satellite_service_location_permission_descriptions
string.value: This is used for alignment with the satellite and for adding location information to messages you send.

string.name: satellite_service_settings_details_descriptions3
string.value: When you connect to the Tiantong satellite, your precise location will be uploaded to the satellite operator.

string.name: satellite_service_details_1_new
string.value: %s. During use, WLAN, mobile data, and Location Services will be disabled. Related features such as  Share, ScreenCast, and SkyTone will be temporarily unavailable.

string.name: satellite_service_details_2_new
string.value: %s. This service requires carrier activation before it can be used. For more information about activation, availability, and fees, contact your satellite communications carrier.

string.name: satellite_service_details_3
string.value: %s. This service is only supported in the Chinese mainland.

string.name: satellite_call_not_support_earpiece
string.value: To maintain a stable connection, the receiver isn't available during satellite calls.

string.name: cannnot_dial_satellite_call_tips
string.value: Device too hot. Wait for it to cool down, then try again.

string.name: switching_to_next_satellite
string.value:
Switching to the next satellite soon
The connection may be briefly interrupted

string.name: device_calibrating_tips
string.value: Tilt your device to complete the circle

string.name: satellite_search_tips
string.value: This works best in open, unobstructed outdoor areas.

string.name: keep_current_posture_check_occlusion
string.value:
Now pointing toward the satellite.
Make sure there are no obstructions in the way such as trees or buildings.

string.name: keep_current_posture_wait_patiently
string.value:
This may take a moment
Please wait

string.name: float_upper_down_phone
string.value: Move the ball to the center

string.name: satellite_connect_failed_guide
string.value: No satellites currently available. Next available window: %1$s–%2$s

string.name: satellite_connect_failed_not_time
string.value: No satellites currently available. Try again later.

string.name: not_link_satellite_dialog_message
string.value: No satellite connection established for %d seconds. Tiantong Satellite Communications will be disabled.

string.name: device_calibrating_fail_tips
string.value: Holding the phone upright, rotate it in a circle

string.name: float_window_keep_posture_check_occlusion
string.value: Make sure there are no obstructions in the way.

string.name: satellite_call_message_notice
string.value: Someone tried to call or message you. To view details, connect to the satellite and open the Phone or Messaging app.

string.name: not_link_satellite_auto_exit_notification_Text
string.value: Tiantong Satellite Communications was disabled because no satellite connection was established for %d seconds.

string.name: satellite_service_settings_airplane_mode
string.value: Tiantong Satellite Communications is unavailable in Airplane mode.

string.name: satellite_exited_for_system_error
string.value: System error. Tiantong Satellite Communications has been disabled. Please re-enable and try again.

string.name: hyacinth_satellite_exited_for_system_error
string.value: System error. Hyacinth Satellite Communications has been disabled. Please re-enable and try again.

string.name: enhance_statement_content
string.value: This service requires an Internet connection and the Contacts permission. It also needs to read your contacts, read and modify the call log, and read and upload/transfer SMS message content. This is to identify calls and messages from unknown numbers. By turning this on, you agree to these terms. For more details about how your personal information is processed, refer to the Statement About Call & Message Identification and Privacy and Permissions Notice.

string.name: number_identity_setting_text_1
string.value: This service identifies calls and messages from unknown numbers based on their type, helping you decide how to respond.

string.name: number_identity_permission_dialog_purpose_1
string.value: This is used to check whether a number is a contact or on the blocklist/trustlist.

string.name: number_identity_permission_dialog_purpose_2
string.value: This is used to determine whether a message should be blocked.

string.name: number_identity_permission_dialog_purpose_3
string.value: This is used to mark phone numbers by category and determine whether a message should be blocked.

string.name: super_privacy_dialog_call_summary
string.value: Super Privacy mode is blocking microphone access. Temporarily disable it for this call?

string.name: super_privacy_dialog_video_call_summary
string.value: Super Privacy mode is blocking microphone and camera access. Temporarily disable it for this call?

string.name: satellite_service_settings_window_mode
string.value: Tiantong Satellite Communications does not support multi-window mode.

string.name: satellite_service_settings_window_suggest
string.value: Open this window in full screen to enable Tiantong Satellite Communications.

string.name: ERROR_CODE_NOT_OPENED_TIANDIWINGCARD
string.value: Satellite services are not currently activated for this SIM. Contact your carrier for assistance.

string.name: ERROR_CODE_NOT_SUPPORT_CARD
string.value: This SIM does not support Tiantong satellite services. Contact your carrier for a replacement.

string.name: ERROR_CODE_OTHERS
string.value: Network error. Contact your carrier for assistance.

string.name: ERROR_CODE_NOT_ACTIVATED_SIM
string.value: This device's IMEI isn't registered with the Tiantong satellite network.

string.name: ERROR_CODE_NOT_OPENED_ROAMING
string.value: Gateway status error. Contact your carrier for assistance.

string.name: satellite_service_settings_skytone_mode
string.value: Unavailable when SkyTone is in use.

string.name: im_message_smc_satellite_no_receipt_tips
string.value: Message may not have reached a satellite. Try again in an unobstructed outdoor area.

string.name: im_message_smc_no_new_message_to_receive
string.value: No replies waiting to be received.

string.name: im_smc_receive_auto_change_01
string.value: Connection timed out. Switched to another satellite.

string.name: im_message_smc_shake
string.value: Tilt your device to complete the circle

string.name: answer_voice_calls_by_flipping
string.value: Manual confirmation is required if you mute the ringer before unfolding.

string.name: satellite_short_notification_info
string.value: This service requires the Location permission and uses Location Services to get your location. By turning this on, you agree to these terms and the Tiantong Satellite Communications User Agreement. For more details, refer to the Statement About Tiantong Satellite Communications and Privacy and Permissions Notice.

string.name: fusion_call_switch_short_notification
string.value: Allow call quality to be improved using WLAN or mobile data when network reception is poor. To learn how your personal data is processed, refer to the %1$s.

string.name: fusion_call_switch_short_notification_sub2
string.value: Statement About Call Quality Improvement and Privacy

string.name: unlock_after_call_notification_descriptions
string.value:
Incoming calls are always shown as banners when you're playing games, navigating on a map, or viewing images and videos in full screen.

They are always shown in full screen when you're using Senior or Expedition mode.

string.name: unlock_after_call_notification_descriptions_normal
string.value:
Incoming calls are always shown as banners when you're playing games, navigating on a map, or viewing images and videos in full screen.

They are always shown in full screen in Senior mode.

string.name: meetime_network_descriptions
string.value: Send and receive BeiDou satellite messages via the Messaging or MeeTime app.

string.name: number_identity_permission_dialog_desc
string.value: The service requires the following permissions:

string.name: wearable_bluee_text
string.value: When the watch is connected to the phone, the watch's mobile data will be automatically disabled to save power. It will be re-enabled if they become disconnected.

string.name: wearable_roaming_subtitle
string.value: Enable data while roaming. Contact your carrier for details.

string.name: im_smc_note_content
string.value: Skipping calibration may affect your ability to use satellite communications. Skip anyway?

string.name: distributed_call_settings_descriptions
string.value: Use your phone's mobile network to make and receive phone calls, send and receive messages, and access the Internet on nearby devices logged in to the same ID. This service uses Bluetooth and WLAN, and will access device, network, and communication information. Call sharing needs to access approximate location information. Learn more

string.name: distributed_call_settings_descriptions_pad
string.value: When your phone is nearby, you can use its mobile network to make and receive phone calls, send and receive messages, and access the Internet on this device. Both devices must be logged in to the same ID and have Bluetooth, WLAN, and this feature enabled. This service needs to access device, network, and communication information. The call sharing feature needs to access approximate location information. Learn more

string.name: distributed_call_settings_network_sharing_descriptions_pad
string.value: When no network is available, automatically use your phone's mobile network if it's nearby.

string.name: distributed_share_call_data
string.value: Make and receive phone calls on your nearby devices.

string.name: distributed_share_message_data
string.value: Send and receive messages on your nearby devices.

string.name: distributed_share_network_data
string.value: Share your Internet connection with your nearby devices.

string.name: video_ring_tone_desc
string.value: Play video ringback tones for incoming and outgoing calls.

string.name: satellite_new_fold_un_support_toast
string.value: Unfold your phone to use satellite communications.

string.name: beidou_satellite_short_notification
string.value: This service requires an Internet connection to authenticate your access privileges and check your remaining message balance. When this is turned on, you'll be able to send messages via BeiDou satellite when you don't have a mobile network or WLAN connection. During use, this service needs to read and upload/transfer your device's phone number, message content, and location information. By turning this on, you agree to these terms and the BeiDou Satellite Messaging User Agreement. For more details about how your personal information is processed, refer to the Statement About BeiDou Satellite Messaging and Privacy.

string.name: beidou_satellite_message_service_details_0
string.value: %1$s. During use, WLAN and mobile data will be temporarily disabled. Services will be restored upon exit.

string.name: beidou_satellite_message_service_details_1
string.value: %s. This feature is only available to China Mobile users who have activated satellite communication features for their account. For more information, contact China Mobile customer service.

string.name: beidou_satellite_message_service_details_2
string.value: %s. This feature is only available in the Chinese mainland.

string.name: beidou_satellite_message_service_settings_airplane_mode
string.value: Unable to use BeiDou Satellite Messaging while in Airplane mode.

string.name: beidou_satellite_message_service_no_net
string.value: No Internet connection. Connect to the Internet and try again.

string.name: beidou_satellite_message_enter_in_call
string.value: Unable to use BeiDou Satellite Messaging when a call is in progress.

string.name: beidou_satellite_message_no_sim_card_descriptions
string.value: To use this service, insert a China Mobile SIM card with BeiDou Satellite Messaging activated.

string.name: go_use_beidou_message_tips
string.value: You've enabled BeiDou Satellite Messaging. Go to Messaging to start using it.

string.name: beidou_satellite_message_select_sim_card
string.value: Select a SIM for satellite messaging. Confirm with your carrier that this service is activated.

string.name: motion_reduce_call_descrition
string.value: Raise your phone to reduce the ringing volume of incoming calls.

string.name: motion_reduce_call_descrition_pad
string.value: Raise your device to reduce the ringing volume of incoming calls.

string.name: motion_quick_mute_descrition
string.value: Flip your phone to mute it when there's an incoming call.

string.name: motion_quick_mute_descrition_pad
string.value: Flip your device to mute it when there's an incoming call.

string.name: penglai_mode_notice
string.value: Unable to do this in Penglai mode.

string.name: motion_quick_call_descrition
string.value: Raise the phone to your ear to answer an incoming call. If you're in speaker mode or using Bluetooth headphones, raising the phone will switch audio to the receiver.

string.name: motion_quick_call_descrition_fold
string.value:
Raise the phone to your ear to answer an incoming call. If you're in speaker mode or using Bluetooth headphones, raising the phone will switch audio to the receiver.
Only available on the primary screen.

string.name: motion_quick_call_descrition_fold_teton
string.value:
Raise the phone to your ear to answer an incoming call. If you're in speaker mode or using Bluetooth earphones, raising the phone will switch to earpiece mode.

*Only available when folded.

string.name: fold_window_dialog_remind_message
string.value: When using satellite communications, keep your phone unfolded and hold it horizontally.

string.name: fold_remind_tips_message
string.value: Satellite connection failed. Keep your phone unfolded during use.

string.name: satellite_service_no_region_card_descriptions
string.value: Tiantong Satellite Communications is not supported in the current region. For more information about supported regions, refer to the FAQs.

string.name: wifi_calling_tips
string.value: When WLAN Calling is on, your phone can route calls via WLAN networks or your carrier’s network, depending on your preference and which signal is stronger. Before turning on this feature, check with your carrier regarding fees and other details.

string.name: car_satellite_tips
string.value: Make and receive phone calls using your car's satellite network.

string.name: edm_operate_prohibit_tip
string.value: This operation is prohibited by enterprise management.

string.name: using_beidou_toast
string.value: Unavailable while BeiDou satellite features are in use.

string.name: new_calling_can_only_use_in_full_screen
string.value: Advanced Calling services only available in full-screen view.

string.name: video_ringtone_no_delete
string.value: Unable to delete items while they are in use.

string.name: video_ringtone_small_no_show
string.value: Video ringtones can't be edited in floating windows.

string.name: video_ringtone_dialog_Exceeding_limit_title
string.value: Max number of video ringtones reached

string.name: video_ringtone_dialog_Exceeding_limit_content
string.value: Remove video ringtones for some contacts to make space for more.

string.name: video_ringtone_dialog_no_space
string.value: Insufficient storage. Free up some space and try again.

string.name: hyacinth_satellite_activate_text
string.value: With Hyacinth, you can make calls and send texts even when you're outside of network coverage. As Hyacinth satellites are still being deployed, this service is currently only available at certain times of the day. During use, this service will access information about your location and network in order to confirm satellite availability.

string.name: cellular_network_notify_text
string.value: Satellite network no longer required. Disable it?

string.name: hyacinth_device_calibrating_tips
string.value: Tilt the device by a large angle to complete calibration

string.name: hyacinth_not_found_satellite
string.value: No available satellites found. Try again later.

string.name: hyacinth_satellites_not_available
string.value: Unable to confirm satellite availability at this time. Continue anyway?

string.name: hyacinth_satellite_short_notification_info
string.value: When you're outside of WLAN and cellular coverage, you can continue using your phone's calling and messaging features via satellite. During use, this service needs to access your location in order to communicate with the satellite. By turning this on, you agree to the Hyacinth User Agreement. For more details about how your personal information is processed, refer to the Statement About Hyacinth and Privacy and Permissions Notice.

string.name: hyacinth_satellite_service_airplane_mode
string.value: Hyacinth Satellite Communications is unavailable in Airplane mode.

string.name: hyacinth_satellite_service_tiantong_mode
string.value: Hyacinth Satellite Communications is unavailable while Tiantong Satellite Communications is in use.

string.name: tiantong_satellite_service_hyacinth_mode
string.value: Tiantong Satellite Communications is unavailable while Hyacinth Satellite Communications is in use.

string.name: hyacinth_service_settings_skytone_mode
string.value: Unavailable when SkyTone is in use.

string.name: hyacinth_satellite_service_enter_in_call
string.value: Unable to enable Hyacinth Satellite Communications during a call.

string.name: hyacinth_satellite_service_no_sim_card
string.value: Please insert a SIM card with Hyacinth Satellite Communications activated and try again.

string.name: hyacinth_satellite_service_no_region_card
string.value: Hyacinth Satellite Communications is not supported in the current region. For more information about supported regions, refer to the FAQs.

string.name: hyacinth_satellite_service_settings_window_suggest
string.value: Open this window in full screen to enable Hyacinth Satellite Communications.

string.name: hyacinth_satellite_service_settings_window_mode
string.value: Hyacinth Satellite Communications does not support multi-window mode.

string.name: hyacinth_request_location_permission
string.value: Location access has not been granted. Grant now?

string.name: call_setting_celia_description
string.value: Let Celia answer and summarize calls for you.

string.name: hyacinth_available_time_refresh
string.value: Available time periods will refresh automatically when Tiantong Satellite Communications is disabled.

string.name: satellite_available_time_connection_use
string.value: This is used for checking available time periods and connecting to the satellite.

string.name: not_support_toast
string.value: This operation is not supported in this mode.
